name: Memory Days Sim Date
summary:
Memory Days Sim Date is a romantic dating game for girls.

Ai moves to a city where she met 3 boys during her summer vacation last year. Is it possible to still have feelings for a guy you met so long ago?

3 dateable characters, 10 different endings
